description: Try our easy to follow Waffles with Poached Pear & Yoghurt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Waffles with Poached Pear & Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel, halve and core pears, keeping stalks intact. Combine 1 cup water, orange juice and 1 cup sugar in a small saucepan over medium heat. Stir until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to the boil. Add pears, cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until tender. Transfer to a plate. Bring syrup to the boil and cook for 20 minutes or until slightly thickened. Cool.

Meanwhile, combine flours, baking powder, 1/2 tsp salt and remaining sugar in a bowl. Whisk buttermilk, butter and eggs in a bowl. Slowly whisk buttermilk mixture into flour mixture until a smooth batter forms.

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Place a large rack over a large tray. Preheat waffle maker as per instructions. Spray with oil and add batter as per instructions. Cook for 35 minutes or until golden and crisp. Transfer to rack and keep warm in oven. Cook remaining waffles.
Serve waffles with pears, syrup and yoghurt. Sprinkle with honeycomb, to garnish.
